description.narrative:
This preventive project will allow the communities of these 2 hills of the commune Giheta to know more about the various risks of disasters that await them and the conduct to be held in front of them.
COJLCC, will implement the DRR project focusing mainly on prevention in collaboration with local actors.
Under the coordination of the communal platform, COJLCC will carry out all the prevention actions foreseen in this Project .
Indeed, resilience in all these aspects (individual, community, institutional) requires the effective involvement of everyone to enable local communities to be able to cope with hazards and to strengthen their local capacities.
COJLCC as in its missions puts forward all the protection of the environment and the safeguarding of biodiversity.
Through this project, the priority actions are constituted by community afforestations on bare hills, afforestations for the protection of public infrastructure and agro-treesforests planted by cooperative members with the aim ofstabilizing environmental balances. This stabilization does not only concern the reforestation of the bare areas as well as the protection of the differential erosion, but also the protection of the banks of the communal track connecting the RN2 to the capital of the commune Giheta.
The effects of the differential erosion of the soil of the 2 hills of the commune Giheta profoundly change the climatology, the fauna and the flora of these regions. This has very negative consequences for the lives of theinhabitants. In order to protect these hills against possible invasion of erosion, as part of our intervention, we intend to trace the contour lines on these hills with a minimum linear length of 10Kms per hill.

participating-org.narrative:
COJLCC has a clear vision, mission, values and objectives. Vision: Environmental protection through tree planting. Mission: Establishment of nurseries in different regions of the country to fight against floods caused by deforestation.
The strategic objectives of COJLCC To achieve its mission, COJLCC works on three main objectives: 1. Contribute to the promotion of food security and peacebuilding through the promotion of agro-pastoral livelihoods 2. Environmental protection through tree planting, tracing of firewalls and contour lines to avoid erosion 3. Promotion of self development and entrepreneurship among young job seekers 4. Promote community development by supporting local co-operatives and associations Values Creativity, Determination, Innovation, Youth Promotion
Areas of intervention of the Organization COJLCC is a Community-oriented organisation oriented towards the implementation of actions which are manifested in large part by actions to protect the environment, food security and promotion of nutrition, it began its actions in Burundi in 2020, and now covers the entire national territory.
